remarks: The multiplication operation of the ordered power series structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
statement:
opsrbas.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
opsrbas.o $e |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) $.
opsrbas.t $e |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) $.
opsrmulr $p |- ( ph -> ( .r ` S ) = ( .r ` O ) ) $.
